title: Integration of various forms of Salvadora Persica « Siwak » into dental composites: A pilot in vitro study.
abstract: This study assessed the potential of Salvadora Persica (Siwak) as a natural bioactive agent for developing dental composites with antibacterial and antioxidant properties. The primary aim was to evaluate its efficacy and identify the optimal form whether powder, extract, or fibers, that achieves a balance between bioactivity, mechanical and physical characteristics.
journal: Dental materials : official publication of the Academy of Dental Materials
